description: Sway under Jamaican waterfalls — a playlist of reggae, island beats and misty plunge moments.

items.name: Reggae Falls
items.description: This fall is literally a gem in Jamaica. It will promise you fun, adventure and a blissful time. Located in St. Thomas' parish, this area is not much crowded, but is a must visit spot for all. It lies on the Johnson River and gives a spectacular view. Every traveler who seeks for some adventure in their tour to Jamaica, should definitely pay a visit here.

items.name: Cane River Falls
items.description: This is a very popular spot for tourists as well as locals. It is located just 15 minutes away from downtown in the Bull Bay area. It is a perfect getaway escape for everyone, especially during the summer. People come here when there is scorching heat and relax in the serene atmosphere. Come along with your swimsuits here as you there are some places where swimming experience is a must.

items.name: Reach Falls
items.description: Almost all tourists pay a visit to the Reach Falls. If you truly love nature, this is the spot where you should be. There are some varieties of flowers, trees and plants which you would hardly find anywhere else in the world. It is located just a few kilometres away from Port Antonio. There is a heart shaped pool where the water flows forcefully.
